sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { motion } from "framer-motion" import { ArrowDown, Github, Linkedin, Mail } from "lucide-react" export default function Hero() { const [typedText, setTypedText] = useState("") const fullText = "Software Development Engineer" useEffect(() => { let i = 0 const typingInterval = setInterval(() => { if (i < fullText.length) { setTypedText(fullText.substring(0, i + 1)) i++ } else { clearInterval(typingInterval) } }, 100) return () => clearInterval(typingInterval) }, []) return (

Hi, I'm Pankaj Jagtap

{typedText} |

) }
